entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is participating in a task with Cedric. He is feeling angry and in pain due to an injury.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is another participant in the task with Harry. He has beaten Harry in previous tasks, including asking Cho to the ball.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is a person who was asked to the ball by both Harry and Cedric.

relationships.description: Harry and Cedric are competing against each other in a task.
Harry and Cho were rivals for attention, as both Harry and Cedric asked her to the ball.
